Nnanna Ikpo bụ onye edemede Naịjirịa bi na mba Amerịka. A kacha mara ya nke ọma maka akwụkwọ akụkọ 2017 ya Fim Sl Forever, nke bụ onye emechiri emechi Lambda Literary Award final for Gay Fiction na 30th Lambda Literary Awards na 2018
Ọ bụkwa onye edemede nke Lambda Literary Award finalist Award for Gay Fiction na 30th Akwụkwọ onyinye Lambda na 2018.
